main event: A UFO sighting occurred on December 6, 1954 in Baltimore, Maryland. The unidentified object moved erratically, changing from white to orange and appeared to stand still at times.
interesting points: The UFO exhibited erratic flight patterns and changed color from white to orange.
At times, the object appeared to stand still, adding to the mysterious nature of the sighting.
The report concludes that the object was probably a balloon or possibly human-made, but it ultimately remained unidentified due to the lack of a flight path and electronic data.
The sighting took place in Baltimore, Maryland, adding to the documented UFO activity in the area.
The report is from a Project Blue Book UFO document, indicating official government investigation of the sighting.
sighted object: unidentified object exhibiting erratic movement and color change
